1458.author: undefined
1458.message: Set the inset as: this.setPadding(Rectangle.inset(4,2)).  This gives it a more pleasing appearance with a border, and also makes it easier to select near the bounds.

1593.author: lauritz
1593.message: Adapted the update behavior on ticks. Reduces the impact of HTML's autoscroll to selected list items.

1935.message: set selection of lists to null

1937.author: conradcalmez
1937.message: added run button for trying out methods

1939.author: robertkrahn
1939.message: show scripts even if they are wrapped

1943.author: lauritz
1943.message: top-most entry of the tag list is "all" now.

1947.author: lauritz
1947.message: tries to get user directly from localStorage now. if there's no user set, then we don't call CGI - logging into trac should not be necessary for developing parts.

1951.author: lauritz
1951.message: workaround for issue #161 - target morph list is scrollable

1953.author: lauritz
1953.message: fixed a bug regarding anonymous morphs.

1955.author: lauritz
1955.message: fixed a defect (weeeeeird property caused an error on deserialization of copies)

1959.author: lauritz
1959.message: added a border to notifications, centered notification text

1961.author: lauritz
1961.message: removed a missed debugger statement. corrected setting of target.

1969.author: lauritz
1969.message: Locked down submorphs of the editor pane. Grabbing and dragging disabled.

1971.author: lauritz
1971.message: Adapted the update behavior on ticks. Reduces the impact of HTML's autoscroll to selected list items.

1973.author: lauritz
1973.message: added confirmation before removal of scripts or connections.

1975.author: lauritz
1975.message: two more checks on attempts to remove scripts or connections.

1979.author: lauritz
1979.message: Refactoring of script annotations (now at scripts not morphs). Added category tagging. Layout changes.

1983.author: lauritz
1983.message: fixed a bug (onBlur event handling) and added the world to the target chooser

1989.author: bsiegmund
1989.message: Run Button now moving when window is resized

2007.author: robertkrahn
2007.message: - Tags text morph now is a input line, fixed a bug in generateSourceForScript()
